Bibliographic References: PPSupp, p. 5, no. 43, pi. 5c; PhV2, p. 56, no. 90; OMC3, p. 103
Imagery Description: (a) Dionysos holding up tambourine, whiteNon Sepcifiedhaired phlyax (mask L) holding brazier on his head, dancing maenad with tambourine, (b) draped woman with mirror in right hand, bearded silen holding wreath above a stele
